      • FilterDatasetByColumnInNotNull

        private org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset<org.apache.spark.sql.Row> FilterDatasetByColumnInNotNull(org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset<org.apache.spark.sql.Row> dataset,
                                                                                              java.lang.String column)
        Filters all non nulls. TIMESTAMP, INT and similar data types that don't have a String "NONE" as a value have null instead.
        Parameters:
        dataset - Dataset.
        column - Column name.
        Returns:
        Return rows without null.
